task: Develop a basic 'Jetpac' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Mute and continue'.
name: Silent Sojourn

branding_data.short_description: Silent Sojourn is a reimagined 'Jetpac' game where players navigate a soundless universe, focusing on visual cues and strategy to succeed.
branding_data.detailed_description: Silent Sojourn is an innovative twist on the classic 'Jetpac' game, where players take on the role of an astronaut navigating through a silent cosmos. In this unique adventure, the absence of sound challenges players to rely on visual cues and strategic thinking to maneuver their jetpack and collect essential items to build their spaceship. The game emphasizes atmospheric visuals and subtle environmental changes, encouraging players to adapt to the quietude and discover new ways to interact with their surroundings. With each level, the silent journey becomes more intricate, offering a fresh take on space exploration and survival.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
